deviceWccpMIB.name: deviceWccpMIB
deviceWccpMIB.description: The deviceWccpMIB is used to monitor the status of the device's WCCP.

WccpServiceType.name: WccpServiceType
WccpServiceType.description: Indicates the type of WCCP service being used. standard(1) - standard or well known service is being used. dynamic(2) - dynamic service is being used. unknown(3) - cannot determine the type of service being used.

WccpVersion.name: WccpVersion
WccpVersion.description: Indicates the version of WCCP being used for a service. version1(1) - WCCP version 1 being used for the service. version2(2) - WCCP version 2 being used for the service. unknown(3) - unknown version.

deviceWccpEnabled.name: deviceWccpEnabled
deviceWccpEnabled.description: When this variable is true(1) then WCCP is enabled. When it is false(2) then WCCP is not enabled.

deviceWccpValueEntry.name: deviceWccpValueEntry
deviceWccpValueEntry.description: A deviceWccpValueTable entry describes the status of a WCCP service.

deviceWccpIndex.name: deviceWccpIndex
deviceWccpIndex.description: An arbitrary value which uniquely identifies the WCCP service.

deviceWccpServiceID.name: deviceWccpServiceID
deviceWccpServiceID.description: This variable indicates WCCP's service id.

deviceWccpServiceType.name: deviceWccpServiceType
deviceWccpServiceType.description: This variable indicates WCCP's service type.

deviceWccpServiceVersion.name: deviceWccpServiceVersion
deviceWccpServiceVersion.description: This variable indicates the WCCP service's version.

deviceWccpPacketsRedir.name: deviceWccpPacketsRedir
deviceWccpPacketsRedir.description: This variable indicates how many WCCP packets have been redirected.

deviceWccpPacketsLowRedir.name: deviceWccpPacketsLowRedir
deviceWccpPacketsLowRedir.description: This variable indicates how many WCCP packets have been redirected - lower 32 bits.

deviceWccpBytesRedir.name: deviceWccpBytesRedir
deviceWccpBytesRedir.description: This variable indicates how many WCCP bytes have been redirected.

deviceWccpBytesLowRedir.name: deviceWccpBytesLowRedir
deviceWccpBytesLowRedir.description: This variable indicates how many WCCP bytes have been redirected - lower 32 bits.
